items.name: case categoricalCrossEntropy
items.desc: Categorical cross-entropy computation between input prediction and labels.

items.name: case cosineDistance
items.desc: Cosine distance loss computation between input predictions and labels.

items.name: case hinge
items.desc: Hinge loss computation between labels and unbounded, zero-centered binary predictions.

items.name: case huber(huberDelta: Float)
items.desc: Huber loss computation between input logits and one-hot encoded labels.

items.name: case log
items.desc: Log loss computation between labels and predictions.

items.name: case meanAbsoluteError
items.desc: Mean absolute error (MAE) computation between input prediction and labels.

items.name: case meanSquareError
items.desc: Mean square error (MSE) computation between input logits and one-hot encoded labels.

items.name: case sigmoidCrossEntropy(labelSmoothing: Float)
items.desc: Sigmoid activation on input logits, and independent computation of cross-entropy loss for each class.

items.name: case softmaxCrossEntropy(labelSmoothing: Float)
items.desc: Softmax activation on input logits, and computation of cross-entropy loss with one-hot encoded labels.

items.name: case yolo(parameters: BNNS.LossFunction.YoloParameters)
items.desc: You Only Look Once (YOLO) loss computation between prediction and ground truth labels.

items.name: struct BNNS.LossFunction.YoloParameters
items.desc: A structure that contains the parameters for You Only Look Once (YOLO) loss computation.
